t: Prime Position: Amazon Named World’s Most Valuable Retail Brand | Press Release | Brand Finance
s: June 27, 2023 - Amazon has once again been named the world’s most valuable retail brand, with a brand value of US$299.3 billion, according to leading brand valuation consultancy, Brand Finance. This is more than double the brand value of Walmart (brand value up 2% to US$113.8 billion).

t: Amazon slips to third-most valuable brand
s: Amazon's brand value grew 3% to top $705 billion. ... Last year Amazon was the world’s most valuable brand, now it’s third on the list. Apple and Google’s exceptionally strong year-on-year growth figures enabled them to leapfrog the retail, media and cloud services giant.
